text: Hi!\nAll users who want to participate in game should type /add_me.\nAfter that type /start_game to start game.
Done! You have been added to the game. When everybody is ready type /start_game.
You have been already added to the game.
Done! You have been removed from the game.
You are not a participant of the game.
You are not a participant of the game, please type /add_me first.
I'm starting the game.
Game has been set up.
Next word: {word}
When everybody has finished answering type /vote to start vote.
Nobody has published their versions yet, can't start a vote.
Your answer was saved.
All participants have published their answers, you can safely type /vote now.
Everybody has voted. To see results type /results.
Results:\n{results}
To start next round type /next.
Questions ended, to start new game type /start_game
Please send your version as a reply to message with word
Game ended because everybody has left it. Type /start if you want to play again.
Game ended. Type /start if you want to play again.
